TopicTitle: Question about scansat and raster propmonitor..

Articles.Content:
Is it possible for raster propmonitor to show scansat info from other space craft dedicated to scanning?  Do I just need to establish an orbital communication network for this info to be relayed?

This is in regards to raster propmonitor showing "no satellite connection" on one of the screens..  

Edited September 4, 2023 by Anodizer
